class.name: aidedecam
class.brief_description: Camera capabilities scanner for Android devices.
class.description: Provides detailed information about device cameras including supported formats, resolutions, hardware levels, and concurrent camera capabilities.

method.name: is_plugin_available
method.description: Returns true if the Android plugin is available.

method.name: get_camera_capabilities
method.description: Returns camera capabilities as a JSON string, and writes a copy to:[br] - [code]user://camera_capabilities.json[/code] [br] [br] Notes: [br] - Does not write to the Documents folder.

method.name: get_camera_capabilities_to_file
method.description: Returns camera capabilities as a JSON string, and writes copies to:[br] - [code]user://camera_capabilities.json[/code] [br] - [code]Documents/<app-name>/<documents_subdir>/camera_capabilities_<timestamp>.json[/code] [br] [br] Parameters:[br] - [param documents_subdir]: Subdirectory under Documents.[br] - Use ".", "/", or "" to write to the app root folder.[br] [br] Notes:[br] - Excessively long or malformed paths fall back to [method get_camera_capabilities].

signal.name: capabilities_updated
signal.description: Emitted when camera capabilities have been successfully gathered and saved.

signal.name: plugin_ready
signal.description: Emitted when the plugin singleton becomes available.

constants.constant: Path to a config resource which carries version-number into runtime.
